column1:
Ain Shams University public hospital.
One of the greatest and largest medical care institutions in Egypt.
Emergency medical services available 24 hrs a day in all fields of medicine.
There are many buildings in the hospital.
One for surgery, others includes internal medicine, geriatric medicine, cardiothoracic surgery, pediatric surgery (whole new one), obstetrics and gynecology, oncology, psychiatry, blood bank and imaging.

Of course it is one of the greatest hospitals in Egypt, with specialized staff in all fields of medicine.

It serves thousands of patients everyday, with the least cost.

It is being renewed nowadays either the buildings or the equipment.

You can get the best medical service there, but you have to wait for you turn for a long time if your case is elective.

The nursing staff is not so professional.

The place is always crowded.

It is the hospital where I learnt how to be a good doctor and how to work under extreme pressure. I owe this place too too much.

Eldemerdash Hospital Track Faculty of Medicine, Ain Shams University. Cairo-based Al-'Abisiyya located neighborhood.

Established Eldemerdash Hospital in 1931 AD for the year 1350 AH under hospital charity name thanks to Naciha (Alsidabd Rahim Mustafa Eldemerdash Pasha was established Faculty of Medicine of its income in 1947 and is thus become the third medical school in Egypt was then set up, Ain Shams University to include them Faculty of Medicine officially the year 1950 after the piece has been updated and set up several departments including. o Eldemerdash university Hospital is dedicated to all sections o surgical hospital of Ain Shams university departments dedicated to the esoteric
